name: Vegetable Stock From 'Afro-Vegan'
description: Use this flavor-packed vegetable stock from Bryant Terry's Afro-Vegan in his Hominy and Spinach in Tomato-Garlic Broth and Savory Grits.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 small head of green cabbage (about 1 pound), thinly sliced
1 head garlic, broken apart into cloves and unpeeled cloves smashed with the flat side of a knife

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all the ingredients in a large pot and bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Decrease the heat to medium-low and simmer uncovered for about 1 hour. Strain through a fine mesh sieve, pressing down on the solids to extract as much liquid as possible. (Compost the solids.) Use immediately or let cool and store in the refrigerator for up to 3 days or the freezer for up to 6 months.
